ModMetadata.Name: IC10 Editor
ModMetadata.Author: aproposmath
ModMetadata.Description:
Custom IC10 editor with more features (and no lag!)
- Undo/Redo functionality (also works on accidential import) - Common keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+? for copy/paste/cut/undo/redo) - Save and close editor with Ctrl+S - Save and close editor + export to IC chip with Ctrl+E - Multiline selection - Syntax highlighting - Tooltips for IC10 instructions - Ctrl+click on a name to open Stationpedia - Switch to native editor - (Currently) no line/size limit (use at your own risk, this might change or break with game updates)
[b]Installation[/b] This is a [b]StationeersLaunchPad[/b] Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
Known issues/pitfalls: - The editor always draw on top of other windows (for instance the "Save New" input prompt when creating a new library script). Move or collapse the editor window to access these prompts.
Source Code: https://github.com/aproposmath/StationeersIC10Editor
ModMetadata.ChangeLog:
0.0.8: - Proper cleanup of mod -> support for hot-reloading during development using BepInEx ScriptEngine plugin
- Open Stationpedia page of name under cursor on Ctrl+mouseclick
- Close editor when pressing Escape key twice within a second
- Fix scrolling to the very end if a new line is appended there
- Move mouse handling code to HandleInput(), fix selecing last line with mouse
- Syntax highlighting for labels, aliases and defines (was removed by accident)
- Handle input only when having focus (Enter/Backspace were triggered when typing in Stationpedia before)
- Move editor window to the right if another game window opened (to not overlap it completely, such that the user at least recognizes where the game window (e.g. Stationpedia) is
- Fix extra newlines afer inserting only one line
